description_text:

I would just like to know where they at or if i am going to get them.. in the amazon listing it was stated that they would ship out off a California warehouse.  I hope you can help me out on this cause amazon customer service isnt helpful.

If it turns out to be unshipped or there’s any issue, we’ll arrange a replacement or resolve it accordingly. Rest assured, if you purchased a SIMSONN product from an authorized platform, we will make sure you receive your order.

Hi PJ Wentline,  We’ve checked with our overseas warehouse, and it appears that your package may have been lost in transit. We’ve already arranged a replacement shipment for you. FedEx Tracking Number: 881966264044

Thank you so for helping me out!
